description:
Sell your catch, upgrade your boat, and dredge the depths for long-buried secrets. Explore a mysterious archipelago
and discover why some things are best left forgotten.

dredge_0.1.0.description:
This is the initial release of the Archipelago Mod.  

- Checks are first time catching fish
- Items randomized are all fish and the relics for the main pursuit
- Goal is completed when all relics are turned into The Collector
- Includes terminal commands for connecting and disconnecting

# Dredge Setup Guide

## Install using Dredge Mod Manager

### Install Dredge Mod Manager

Head on over to the Dredge Mod Manager page and follow the installation instructions.

[Dredge Mod Manager Page](https://dredgemods.com/manager/)

### Install Archipelago Mod using Dredge Mod Manager

You can install the Archipelago mod using `Dredge Mod Manager` in one of two ways.

[Archipelago Mod Download Page](https://dredgemods.com/mods/archipelagodredge)

You can use the Dredge Mod Manager website and click on the `Install via the Mod Manager` button.

You can also search for the "Archipelago" mod in the `Dredge Mod Manager` interface. The mod manager should automatically install
all necessary dependencies as well.

## Running the Modded Game

Click on the `Play` button in the bottom left in `Dredge Mod Manager` to start the game with the Archipelago mod installed.

## Configuring your YAML File
### What is a YAML and why do I need one?
You can see the [basic multiworld setup guide](/tutorial/Archipelago/setup/en) here on the Archipelago website to learn 
about why Archipelago uses YAML files and what they're for.

### Where do I get a YAML?
You can use the [game options page](/games/Dredge/player-options) here on the Archipelago 
website to generate a YAML using a graphical interface.


## Joining an Archipelago Session
### Connecting to server
Once your save is loaded in DREDGE open the terminal (by pressing `~`)
Type the command `ap connect <hostname> <port> <slotname> <password(is optional)>`

### Gameplay

Dredge players send checks by fishing new fish.\
Game is completed upon turning all the relics into The Collector

### Chat/Commands
TBD

### In-Game Commands
Connect to multiworld: `ap connect <hostname> <port> <slotname> <password(is optional)>`\
Disconnect from multiworld: `ap disconnect`

dredge_0.4.0.description:
+ Added indicator on harvest minigame if fish or variant still needs to be caught
+ Added packaged explosive items and logic for fish behind them
+ Added upgrade books as items
+ Added baits and logic relevant to exotic fish
+ Fixed exotic aberrations to require Iron Rig DLC
+ Fixed a few failing tests

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/alextric234/ArchipelagoDredge/compare/dredge_0.3.5...dredge_0.4.0
dredge_0.4.0.title: DREDGE APWorld v0.4.0

dredge_0.5.0.description:
## The Dredging Update
- Added all dredging spots as location checks
- Handling items and locations via ids instead of names allowing for DREDGE to be run in any language
- Locked dredging relics behind the multiworld 
  - You can still get the relics from quests
- The first time a fish is successfully fished or a dredge spot is successfully dredged you will not receive an item.  Instead just the location will be checked.  Further actions will result in the expected item.
- Revealing the entire encyclopedia on connection
dredge_0.5.0.title: DREDGE APWorld v0.5.0
